DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether the diagnosis of the extent of a malignant tumor arising from the epithelium of the rectal mucosa.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the diagnosis of the extent of a malignant tumor arising from the epithelium of the rectal mucosa.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A malignant tumor arising from the epithelium of the rectal mucosa.  Most rectal carcinomas are adenocarcinomas; squamous cell carcinomas of the rectum are also seen.  Prognosis depends on tumor stage (depth of wall invasion, lymph node involvement, presence of distal metastases). -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A malignant epithelial neoplasm that arises from the rectum. The vast majority are adenocarcinomas.

Property.preferredDefinition: The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

Concepts.definition: The extent of a cancer in the body.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: T3N0M0, TanyN1-2M0 disease as
ReferenceDocuments.description: T3N0M0, TanyN1-2M0 disease as determined by pre-treatment CT scans and pelvic MRI or transrectal ultrasound. Patients with T4 disease extending to circumferential margin of rectum or invading adjacent organs are not eligible.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: T3N0M0, T1-3N1-2M0 disease as determined by pre-neoadjuvant therapy CT scans and pelvic MRI or transrectal ultrasound. Patients with T4 disease are not eligible
